amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt all rules promulgated by the Department of Homeland Security from the provisions of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 112-311 to exempt all rules promulgated by the Department of Homeland Security.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 242 (Roll no. 898).

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
